solution_line_template: In this many years, Emma’s sister will be {sister_future_age} years old: {sister_future_age} - {sister_current_age} = <<{sister_future_age}-{sister_current_age}={years_to_future}>>{years_to_future} years.
When her sister is {sister_future_age} years old, Emma will be {emma_current_age} + {years_to_future} = <<{emma_current_age}+{years_to_future}={emma_future_age}>>{emma_future_age} years.
